item.description:
We've always had a 9/11 Truth presence at PorcFest, including a last-minute We Are Change presence at the 2010 event with Luke Rudkowski showing some previews of his new video.

If you haven't been to Porcfest before, here's a video of just some highlights: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WXWj-BZRfnQ

The Porcupine Freedom Festival is a weeklong event, with the highlights being Friday and Saturday. The AltExpo group can probably host you for camping (write camp@AltExpo.org if you'd like a little patch of land to camp on). For more details on PorcFest, go to their official site here: http://porcfest.com

We'll have a projector and screen under the Big Tent of the AltExpo and we'll have our DVD video library of over 100 videos. We'll have plenty to choose from for viewing after dark.
item.how_to_find_us: we'll be at the AltExpo tent
item.why: We always have a presence at PorcFest, so let's be sure we're there with a lot of things to say this year, the 10th anniversary of the horrors of 9/11. Let's organize porcupines to go to NYC for 9/11.
item.name: Porcupine Freedom Festival - 9/11 Truth presence
